name: MS Word HTML cleanse
description: Taking away the horrifying crap MS Word thinks is useful.  PS - this removes `img` tags too (since the files I'm dealing with have ugly freakin images in them)
content:
<html dir="ltr" xmlns:mso="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" xmlns:msdt="uuid:C2F41010-65B3-11d1-A29F-00AA00C14882"><head>
<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
<mso:CustomDocumentProperties>
<mso:ContentTypeId msdt:dt="string">0x010100C568DB52D9D0A14D9B2FDCC96666E9F2007948130EC3DB064584E219954237AF390080BB021C8D332442BDDA5746E7942999</mso:ContentTypeId><mso:ContentType msdt:dt="string">Page</mso:ContentType><mso:PublishingContact msdt:dt="string"></mso:PublishingContact><mso:PublishingContactPicture msdt:dt="string">, </mso:PublishingContactPicture><mso:Approval_x0020_Level msdt:dt="string"></mso:Approval_x0020_Level><mso:Categories msdt:dt="string"></mso:Categories><mso:Assigned_x0020_To msdt:dt="string"></mso:Assigned_x0020_To></mso:CustomDocumentProperties></xml><![endif]-->
<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8"><meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge"><title>
	Crushed Ice/Chilled Water
</title><meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
  <style type="text/css">
    @charset "UTF-8";
    *, :before, :after {
      -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
      -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
      box-sizing: border-box;
    }
    html, body {
      width: 100%;
      height: 100%;
      margin: 0;
      padding: 0;
      outline: 0;
      border: 0;
    }
    html {
      overflow-y: scroll;
      font-size: 15px;
      line-height: 1.5;  
      font-size-adjust: 100%;
      -webkit-font-smoothing: subpixel-antialias;
    }
    body {
      font-family: "WOL_Reg", "Segoe TV", "Cantarell", "Open Sans", "Helvetica Neue", "Helvetica", "Arial", sans-serif;
      min-width: 100%;
      font-size: 100%;
    }
    img {
      width: auto;
      max-width: 100%;
      height: auto;
      border: none;
      outline: 0;
    }
    #start {
      overflow: hidden;
      margin: 0 auto;
      text-align: center;
      padding: 4px;
      max-width: 640px;
      width: 100%;
      height: auto;
      white-space: normal;
      word-wrap: break-word;
      overflow-wrap: break-word;
    }
    .nav {
      width: 96px;
      height: 96px;
      margin: 10px 2px;
      padding: 4px;
      border-radius: 4px;
      box-shadow: none;
      border: none;
      outline: 0;
      background: url(https://placehold.it/96x96) center center / cover no-repeat;
      box-shadow: 0 1px 3px #666;
    }
    .nav:hover {
      cursor: pointer;
      opacity: .75;
    }
    .nav:active {
      opacity: .5;
    }
    #mehp {
      background: url(data:image/png;base64,
author: Deryck
